rationale: Adding grated carrot introduces natural sweetness, color, and nutrients, while its fine texture ensures quick, even cooking with the sautéed green vegetables, creating a balanced vegetable base for the meal.

causal_chain.action: grate whole carrot against box grater over frying pan

causal_precondition_on_affordance.reasons: The box grater has visible metal holes with sharp edges designed to shred hard vegetables into fine pieces.
The whole carrot is solid and has a smooth, graspable surface that allows it to be pressed against the grater without breaking apart prematurely.
The frying pan has a wide, deep enough surface to catch all grated carrot pieces as they fall.

causal_effect_on_affordance.reasons: The whole carrot is reduced to a small, unusable piece that cannot be effectively pressed against the grater.
The frying pan now contains a mix of sautéed green vegetables and grated carrot, which is ready to be stirred for even cooking.

counterfactual_challenge_question: What if the box grater's holes were dull and not sharp?
expected_challenge_outcome: The carrot would not shred into fine, uniform pieces; instead, it would tear into larger, uneven chunks that may not cook evenly with the green vegetables, and some carrot pieces might fall outside the frying pan due to inconsistent shredding.

failure_reflecting.reason: Grated carrot clogs the grater's holes, preventing further shredding of the carrot and causing pieces to pile up on the grater surface instead of falling into the pan.
failure_reflecting.recovery_strategy: Tap the grater firmly against the side of the frying pan to dislodge the clogged carrot pieces, then resume grating the remaining portion of the carrot using gentle, consistent pressure.

critical_frames.action_state_change_description: Hands position the whole carrot against the box grater above the frying pan, initiating the back-and-forth grating motion.

causal_chain.action: grate whole carrot against box grater over frying pan

causal_precondition_on_affordance.reasons: The box grater's metal holes have visible sharp edges suitable for shredding hard vegetables.
The whole carrot has a firm, smooth surface that can be securely held and pressed against the grater.

causal_effect_on_affordance.reasons: The hands apply pressure and move the carrot against the grater, initiating the shredding process.

hotspot.description: Sharp metal grating holes on the box grater
hotspot.mechanism: Friction and shear force from the carrot being pressed against the sharp holes cut the vegetable into fine, uniform pieces that fall downward.

critical_frames.action_state_change_description: All usable portions of the whole carrot are grated into the frying pan, hands move the box grater away from the pan, completing the shredding process.

causal_chain.action: grate whole carrot against box grater over frying pan

causal_precondition_on_affordance.reasons: The remaining carrot piece is too small to be effectively pressed against the grater's holes.
The frying pan holds both the original green vegetables and the newly grated carrot.

causal_effect_on_affordance.reasons: The mixed vegetables in the pan are now ready to be stirred for even cooking and flavor integration.

hotspot.description: Side edge of the frying pan
hotspot.mechanism: Tapping the grater against the pan's side uses impact force to dislodge any remaining grated carrot pieces stuck in the grater holes into the pan.
